label: 怪物图鉴效果 Bestiary Effects

Effect: Air of Sickness.name: 效果: 呕逆瘴气 Air of Sickness
Effect: Air of Sickness.description: 生物抵抗疾病和移除恶心的骰点获得-2状态减值。

Effect: Ancestral Journey.name: 效果: 祖先旅程 Ancestral Journey
Effect: Ancestral Journey.description: 生物在意志豁免和一切技能检定中获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Ancestral Response.name: Effect: Ancestral Response
Effect: Ancestral Response.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws.

Effect: Artificer's Command.name: Effect: Artificer's Command
Effect: Artificer's Command.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws.

Effect: Bark Orders.name: Effect: Bark Orders
Effect: Bark Orders.description: All kobold allies within 30 feet of him gain a +1 status bonus on attack rolls and saving throws against fear effects until the start of Chief Sootscale's next turn.

Effect: Bloodline Magic (Stirvyn Banyan).name: 效果: 血统奥秘 Bloodline Magic (斯特尔凡·榕木)
Effect: Bloodline Magic (Stirvyn Banyan).description: 当斯特尔凡施放血统法术时，先祖记忆的喷涌会让他或是一个法术目标在技能检定上获得+1状态加值，维持1轮。

Effect: Bond in Light.name: Effect: Bond in Light
Effect: Bond in Light.description: The creature glows with bright light in a 20-foot emanation and dim light to 40 feet and has fast healing 10.

Effect: Bully the Departed.name: 效果: 霸凌死者 Bully the Departed
Effect: Bully the Departed.description: 生物获得再生15（力场或善良使之失效），并且他的打击造成额外@Damage[1d8[spirit]]伤害。

Effect: Chug.name: 效果: 一口闷 Chug
Effect: Chug.description: 生物在运动技能检定、伤害骰和对抗恐惧的豁免骰上获得+2物品加值。

Effect: Consume Memories.name: 效果: 吞噬记忆 Consume Memories
Effect: Consume Memories.description: 作为吞噬记忆的结果，沃达凯于1分钟内在所有的技能检定中获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Consume Organ.name: 效果: 吞噬器官 Consume Organ
Effect: Consume Organ.description: 生物15点临时生命值以及在攻击与伤害掷骰上的+1状态加值。

Effect: Crush of Hundreds.name: Effect: Crush of Hundreds
Effect: Crush of Hundreds.description: The creature takes a -10-foot penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Crushing Spirits.name: Effect: Crushing Spirits
Effect: Crushing Spirits.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all its Speeds.

Effect: Curl Up.name: 效果: 卷曲 Curl Up

Effect: Curse of Stone.name: Effect: Curse of Stone
Effect: Curse of Stone.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to its AC.

Effect: Darivan's Bloodline Magic.name: 效果: 达利梵的血统奥秘 Darivan's Bloodline Magic
Effect: Darivan's Bloodline Magic.description: 达利梵的血统奥秘被激活时，他的动作变得超自然的优雅和使人分神，他于1轮内在交涉检定上获得+1状态加值，或者一个目标于1轮内在意志豁免上承受-1状态减值。

Effect: Deceitful Feast (Failure).name: 效果: 欺诈盛宴 Deceitful Feast (失败)
Effect: Deceitful Feast (Failure).description: 生物在对抗狡蟾精的任何能力或是法术时的意志豁免获得-1环境减值，这个减值会在每次失败时增加，最大为-5。

Effect: Defensive Slam.name: Effect: Defensive Slam
Effect: Defensive Slam.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Defensive Slice.name: 效果: 寓守于攻 Defensive Slice
Effect: Defensive Slice.description: 德雷勒夫男爵使用他的武器摆出防御姿态，然后尝试一次近战打击。直到他的下个回合开始前，他在所有打击中承受-2状态减值（包括本次打击），并且在他的AC上获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Despoiler.name: 效果: 掠夺者 Despoiler
Effect: Despoiler.description: 生物在对抗毒素、疾病以及药物的所有豁免上承受-2环境减值。

Effect: Dire Warning.name: 效果: 惩戒警告 Dire Warning
Effect: Dire Warning.description: 生物在攻击骰与伤害骰上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Disturbing Vision.name: 效果: 扰心乱视 Disturbing Vision
Effect: Disturbing Vision.description: 幻视持续[[/br 1d4 #Disturbing Visions Duration]]{1d4轮}，并且在此期间，罗刹王和该范围内的所有邪恶生物在所有的检定骰上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Drain Luck.name: 效果: 吸命吮运 Drain Luck
Effect: Drain Luck.description: 该生物对所有检定获得状态减值。

Effect: Ectoplasmic Form (Physical).name: 效果: 灵质形态 Ectoplasmic Form (实体)
Effect: Ectoplasmic Form (Physical).description: 生物失去它的虚体特征，失去对精准伤害的免疫和全部抗力。它根据生物类型获得AC增加，并且近战打击造成挥砍和穿刺而不是虚能伤害。

Effect: Energy Ward.name: Effect: Energy Ward
Effect: Energy Ward.description: The cascader gains resistance 15 to the triggering damage, replacing any other resistance gained from this ability. The cascader's melee strikes also deal an additional 4d10 damage of this type.

Effect: Entangling Train.name: 效果: 纠缠裙裢 Entangling Train
Effect: Entangling Train.description: 生物速度受到-15尺的环境减值。

Effect: Fan Bolt.name: Effect: Fan Bolt
Effect: Fan Bolt.description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its swim Speed.

Effect: Fetid Screech (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Fetid Screech (Critical Failure)
Effect: Fetid Screech (Critical Failure).description: The creature takes a -5 foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Fettering Fedora.name: Effect: Fettering Fedora
Effect: Fettering Fedora.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds.

Effect: Fiery Form.name: 效果: 火焰形态 Fiery Form
Effect: Fiery Form.description: 血鬼婆获得火焰特征以及60尺飞行速度，变得免疫火焰，并如同火炬一样发光。

Effect: Fortune's Favor.name: 效果: 命运青睐 Fortune's Favor
Effect: Fortune's Favor.description: 当哈罗玩偶进行一次某个具体种类的豁免骰时，它掷骰两次并取更高的结果。适用的豁免骰种类由哈罗玩偶最近一次解读哈罗牌时的花色对应的最契合的种类决定，强韧（锤或盾），反射（匙或书），意志（星或冕）。

Effect: Ghonhatine Feed.name: 效果: 地蜥兽啃食 Ghonhatine Feed
Effect: Ghonhatine Feed.description: 生物获得快速治疗5，并且在伤害检定中获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Gird in Prayer.name: Effect: Gird in Prayer
Effect: Gird in Prayer.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death, mental, and possession effects.

Effect: Goblin Song.name: 效果: 地精之歌 Goblin Song
Effect: Goblin Song.description: 生物在察觉检定和意志豁免上承受-1状态减值。

Effect: Guardian's Aegis.name: 效果: 向导之护 Guardian's Aegis
Effect: Guardian's Aegis.description: 在羽熊30尺范围内的所有盟友获在对抗魔法效果的豁免掷骰上获得+1状态加值。若效果来源为恶魔或其它混乱邪恶阵营魔族，则该加值增加至+2。

Effect: Harrowing Misfortune.name: 效果: 哈罗厄运 Harrowing Misfortune
Effect: Harrowing Misfortune.description: 生物在下一次进行某个具体种类的掷骰时掷骰两次并取更低的结果，种类由卡片的花色决定。一个生物同时只能被哈罗厄运的一种效应所诅咒，新的诅咒会覆盖先前的诅咒。诅咒会在1分钟后或是该具体掷骰被进行之后结束，取其先者。花色与其对应的效应是：锤（近战攻击骰），匙（反射豁免），盾（强韧豁免），书（技能检定），星（意志豁免），冕（法术攻击骰）。

Effect: Hurl Net.name: Effect: Hurl Net
Effect: Hurl Net.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Lost Plates.name: 效果: 装甲板脱落 Lost Plates
Effect: Lost Plates.description: 生物的AC受到等同于脱落装甲板数量的减值。

Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad).name: 效果: 操纵运势-霉运 Manipulate Luck (Bad)
Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad).description: 生物必须在投下一个d20骰的时候投掷两次并选用更低的点数。

Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good).name: 效果: 操纵运势-好运 Manipulate Luck (Good)
Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good).description: 生物可以在接下来的1分钟内为一个d20骰投掷两次并选用更高的点数。

Effect: Mortal Reflection.name: Effect: Mortal Reflection
Effect: Mortal Reflection.description: The imperfect automaton draws upon the target's emotions to recall a semblance of mortal feeling, gaining a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed for 1 minute.

Effect: Motivating Assault.name: Effect: Motivating Assault
Effect: Motivating Assault.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Effect: Nanite Surge (Glow).name: 效果: 纳米机械激增-发光 Nanite Surge (Glow)
Effect: Nanite Surge (Glow).description: 生物10尺弥漫范围内发出昏暗光照。

Effect: Oceanic Armor.name: Effect: Oceanic Armor
Effect: Oceanic Armor.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Pain Frenzy.name: 效果: 痛苦狂怒 Pain Frenzy
Effect: Pain Frenzy.description: 生物的攻击和伤害检定有+2状态加值。

Effect: Phantasmagoric Fog.name: Effect: Phantasmagoric Fog
Effect: Phantasmagoric Fog.description: The hall fills with violet fog that imposes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to all creatures within it and exposes anyone who enters it to phantasmagoric fog.

Effect: Poison Frenzy.name: Effect: Poison Frenzy
Effect: Poison Frenzy.description: The poison eater flies into a frenzy that lasts for 1 minute. While in a frenzy, the poison eater gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with melee Strikes, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with melee Strikes, gains 20 temporary Hit Points until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC.

Effect: Prepare Fangs.name: Effect: Prepare Fangs
Effect: Prepare Fangs.description: Daggers deals additional poison damage equal to the counter value.

Effect: Pry.name: 效果: 撬牙 Pry
Effect: Pry.description: 生物在基于魅力的技能检定上承受-1状态减值。

Effect: Putrid Stench.name: 效果: 腐烂恶臭 Putrid Stench

Effect: Raise Guard.name: Effect: Raise Guard
Effect: Raise Guard.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland.name: Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland
Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland.description: The creature gains energy damage resistance similar to the triggering type.

Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk.name: Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk
Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk.description: The creature gains physical damage resistance similar to the triggering type.

Effect: Reminder of Doom.name: Effect: Reminder of Doom
Effect: Reminder of Doom.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Effect: Remove Face.name: 效果: 移脸 Remove Face
Effect: Remove Face.description: 生物的魅力检定以及以魅力为基础的技能检定获得永久的-4状态减值。只有在受害者从无面屠夫那里取回它的脸皮并对其施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{复原术 Restoration}，该减值才能被移除。

Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure.name: Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure
Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure.description: The affected creature takes a -20-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 2 rounds.

Effect: Rockfall Failure.name: Effect: Rockfall Failure
Effect: Rockfall Failure.description: The affected creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Rotting Stench.name: Effect: Rotting Stench
Effect: Rotting Stench.description: While within the aura, creatures also take a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against fear and to recover from the sickened condition.

Effect: Share Pain.name: 效果: 分担痛苦 Share Pain
Effect: Share Pain.description: 生物的速度受到状态减值，具体数值取决于豁免结果。

Effect: Smash Kneecaps.name: Effect: Smash Kneecaps
Effect: Smash Kneecaps.description: The creature's Speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Effect: Song of the Swamp.name: 效果: 沼泽之歌 Song of the Swamp
Effect: Song of the Swamp.description: 生物在伤害骰、对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定上获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Spotlight.name: Effect: Spotlight
Effect: Spotlight.description: The target gains a +2 status bonus to Performance checks and resistance 10 to mental damage.

Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Torment.name: 效果: 激发狂热-高阶折磨者 Stoke the Fervent - High Tormentor
Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Torment.description:
每个听到呼喊的盟友在攻击骰和伤害骰获得+4状态加值，豁免骰上获得+2状态加值，AC上获得-2状态减值。只要它们还有能力，受影响的盟友每轮必须使用至少一个行动来进行打击（即使这意味着攻击一个盟友，物品，或者空气）。

持续[[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4轮}。添加时需手动调整持续时间。

Effect: Susceptible to Mockery (Critical.name: Effect: Susceptible to Mockery (Critical Failure)
Effect: Susceptible to Mockery (Critical.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Strikes and damage rolls against foes.

Effect: Swell.name: Effect: Swell
Effect: Swell.description: The creature grows to Huge size, and its reach increases to 15 feet. It also gains 12 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to bludgeoning, and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls

Effect: Sylvan Wine (Horned Hunter).name: Effect: Sylvan Wine (Horned Hunter)
Effect: Sylvan Wine (Horned Hunter).description: The creature gains a +3 item bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Technology Control.name: Effect: Technology Control
Effect: Technology Control.description:
The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its attack rolls and DCs against a creature it would not normally attack.

Note: This effect applies a penalty to all rolls and DCs while active.

Effect: Towering Stance (Disbelieved).name: 效果: 高耸姿态-不相信 Towering Stance (Disbelieved)

Effect: Unsettling Attention.name: Effect: Unsettling Attention
Effect: Unsettling Attention.description: 失败 The creature becomes unsettled and suffers a -2 penalty to all saves against fear effects as long as they remain within the hex containing Candlemere.

Effect: Vent Energy.name: Effect: Vent Energy
Effect: Vent Energy.description: The hadrinnex's weapon arm strikes deal an extra 2d6 energy damage according to the damage type in the energy gland.

Effect: Viscous Trap.name: Effect: Viscous Trap
Effect: Viscous Trap.description: The creature takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Unluck Aura.name: 效果: 不幸灵光 Unluck Aura
Effect: Unluck Aura.description: 生物必须在所有检定中投掷2次并取较差的结果。

Effect: Ill Omen.name: 效果: 不幸预兆 Ill Omen
Effect: Ill Omen.description: 生物在不幸预兆灵光内的攻击检定，技能检定，豁免骰或获得-1减值，并且免疫幸运效应，为时一天。

Effect: Undead Mastery.name: 效果: 不死统御 Undead Mastery
Effect: Undead Mastery.description: 生物在攻击检定、伤害检定、AC、豁免和技能检定上获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Countered by Water.name: 效果: 为水所克 Countered by Water
Effect: Countered by Water.description: 生物的攻击骰承受-1环境惩罚，他们的颚咬攻击不再造成火焰伤害。

Effect: Countered by Fire.name: 效果: 为火所克 Countered by Fire
Effect: Countered by Fire.description: 生物在攻击骰和AC上承受-1环境修正，且他们的颚咬攻击不再造成电击伤害。

Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.name: 效果: 亵渎之语 Blasphemous Utterances
Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.description:
生物在对抗心灵效果的豁免检定中均会受到-2环境减值。

而且除非能成功通过@Check[type:flat|dc:10]检定，否则无法在该灵光范围内执行具有专注特征的动作。检定失败意味着浪费该动作。

Effect: Profane Gift.name: 效果: 亵渎之赐 Profane Gift
Effect: Profane Gift.description: 生物在攻击检定、技能检定和豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure).name: 效果: 伏光闪烁 Lurker's Glow (大失败)
Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure).description: 生物在效果持续时间内在20尺弥漫范围内散发明亮光照。

Effect: Infectious Aura.name: 效果: 传染灵光 Infectious Aura
Effect: Infectious Aura.description:
生物对疾病的豁免都承受-2减值。

如果范围内的生物携带疾病或已经在发病过程中，则它相邻的生物暴露在该疾病的影响下，并且需要对抗相同的豁免DC。

Effect: Bodyguard's Defense.name: 效果: 保镖的护卫 Bodyguard's Defense

Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Suc.name: 效果: 修修补补 Instinctual Tinker (大成功)
Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Suc.description: 生物的攻击检定有+1环境加值。

Effect: Uncanny Tinker.name: 效果: 俺寻思 Uncanny Tinker
Effect: Uncanny Tinker.description: 生物的攻击检定获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Barbed Net.name: 效果: 倒钩网 Barbed Net
Effect: Barbed Net.description: 生物的速度获得-10尺环境减值。

Effect: Hypnotic Stare.name: 效果: 催眠凝视 Hypnotic Stare

Effect: Sixfold Flurry.name: 效果: 六臂乱舞 Sixfold Flurry
Effect: Sixfold Flurry.description: 六臂神卫在AC上获得环境加值，等于他们不进行的打击数量。

Effect: Resonance.name: 效果: 共鸣 Resonance
Effect: Resonance.description: 生物在具有选定特征的效果上的攻击骰和伤害骰获得+1状态加值；具有元素和选定特征的生物在所有攻击和伤害骰上获得该加值。

Effect: Brand of the Impenitent.name: 效果: 冥顽烙印 Brand of the Impenitent
Effect: Brand of the Impenitent.description: 生物的AC和豁免会承受-1状态减值，抗力降低2点，并且在对抗圣洁伤害时获得2点弱点。

Effect: Scraping Clamor.name: 效果: 刮擦喧闹 Scraping Clamor

Effect: Claim Corpse - Fleshy.name: 效果: 占据尸体 - 血肉 Claim Corpse - Fleshy

Effect: Claim Corpse - Skeletal.name: 效果: 占据尸体 - 骷髅 Claim Corpse - Skeletal

Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success.name: 效果: 占星 Read the Stars (大成功)
Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success.description: 生物的所有豁免检定获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Mangling Rend.name: 效果: 压碎 Mangling Rend
Effect: Mangling Rend.description: 目标在任何速度上都有-20尺状态减值，直到下一回合。

Effect: Sinful Bite.name: 效果: 原罪之噬 Sinful Bite
Effect: Sinful Bite.description: 生物速度受到-10尺的状态减值。

Effect: Timely Advice.name: 效果: 及时忠告 Timely Advice
Effect: Timely Advice.description: 贤者给与盟友一道建议，提供有价值的见解。盟友在该检定上获得+2环境加值。

Effect: Glowing Spores.name: 效果: 发光孢子 Glowing Spores
Effect: Glowing Spores.description: 生物在隐秘检定上承受-4减值。

Effect: Haywire.name: 效果: 发生故障 Haywire
Effect: Haywire.description: 生物的攻击受到-1环境减值，但会造成额外@Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}。

Effect: Guide's Warning.name: 效果: 向导的警告 Guide's Warning

Effect: Feed.name: 效果: 吞食 Feed
Effect: Feed.description: 取决于生物使用吞食能力的次数，该生物获得检定和DC上的状态加值。

Effect: Absorb Memories.name: 效果: 吸取记忆 Absorb Memories
Effect: Absorb Memories.description: 生物所有技能检定中获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: 效果: 呼神护卫 Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects and a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Wrath of Fate.name: 效果: 命运之怒 Wrath of Fate
Effect: Wrath of Fate.description: 受影响的生物在尝试攻击，豁免，技能检定时，掷骰两次，并取较低的结果。之后效果终止。

Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.name: 效果: 噬魂 Devour Soul (受害者等级为15或更高)
Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.description: 生物获得10点临时生命值，并且攻击检定和伤害检定获得获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Devour Soul.name: 效果: 噬魂 Devour Soul
Effect: Devour Soul.description: 生物获得10点临时生命值并且攻击检定和伤害检定获得获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Xulgath Stench.name: 效果: 地蜥人恶臭 Xulgath Stench
Effect: Xulgath Stench.description: 生物的速度承受-5尺状态减值。

Effect: Hydra Heads.name: 效果: 多头蛇之头 Hydra Heads

Effect: Lost Red Cap.name: 效果: 失去红帽子 Lost Red Cap
Effect: Lost Red Cap.description: 生物在伤害检定遭受-4状态减值。

Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration.name: 效果: 宁芙仙后启迪灵感 Nymph Queen's Inspiration
Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration.description:
生物在所有手艺检定、表演检定和意志豁免上获得+1状态加值。

吟游诗人获得额外好处：

如果宁芙仙后将她的启迪灵感赋予一位吟游诗人，同时这位宁芙仙后还是这名吟游诗人的缪斯，那么宁芙仙后选择一项额外的信物增益：在所有学识检定中+1状态加值，在所有决定组曲法术效果的表演检定中+2状态加值，在所有未受训技能检定中+4状态加值，或在对抗精类的意志豁免中+4状态加值。

Effect: Curse of Frost.name: 效果: 寒之诅咒 Curse of Frost

Effect: Tail Lash (Skill Check).name: 效果: 尾扫 Tail Lash (技能检定)
Effect: Tail Lash (Skill Check).description: 生物在触发效果的技能检定中承受-2环境减值。

Effect: Tail Lash (Attack Roll).name: 效果: 尾扫 Tail Lash (攻击检定)
Effect: Tail Lash (Attack Roll).description: 生物在触发效果的攻击检定中承受-2环境减值。

Effect: Transfer Protection.name: 效果: 屏障扩展 Transfer Protection
Effect: Transfer Protection.description: A creature can wear a willing cassisian as a helmet. While it does, the cassisian can’t act, but the cassisian extends their +1 status bonus to AC and saves against unholy creatures to their wearer. At any time, the cassisian can detach themself from their wearer as a single action.

Effect: Witchflame (Critical Failure).name: 效果: 巫焰 Witchflame (大失败)

Effect: Witchflame (Failure).name: 效果: 巫焰 Witchflame (失败)

Effect: Witchflame (Success).name: 效果: 巫焰 Witchflame (成功)

Effect: Lantern of Hope.name: 效果: 希望之灯 Lantern of Hope
Effect: Lantern of Hope.description: 生物在伤害骰和对抗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{极潮绝望 Wave of Despair}法术的豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).name: 效果: 希望之灯(格式塔) Lantern of Hope (Gestalt)
Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).description: 生物在伤害骰和对抗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{极潮绝望 Wave of Despair}法术的豁免骰上获得+3状态加值。

Effect: Calming Bioluminescence.name: 效果: 平静微光 Calming Bioluminescence
Effect: Calming Bioluminescence.description: 生物对情绪特征的效果的豁免检定有+2环境加值。

Effect: Protean Anatomy.name: 效果: 幻蛇体质 Protean Anatomy
Effect: Protean Anatomy.description: 当幻蛇承受酸、电击、或音波伤害后，它会立即获得抗力数据中所列数值的对应伤害抗力。

Effect: Guiding Words.name: 效果: 引导之语 Guiding Words

Effect: Gloom Aura.name: 效果: 忧郁灵光 Gloom Aura
Effect: Gloom Aura.description: 生物在对抗情绪效果时的豁免受-1环境减值。

Effect: Stench.name: 效果: 恶臭 Stench
Effect: Stench.description: 生物在对抗疾病以及从@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}状态中恢复的豁免检定中会承受-2环境减值。

Effect: War Leader.name: 效果: 战争领袖 War Leader
Effect: War Leader.description: 生物在攻击骰和技能检定上就能获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Battle Cry.name: 效果: 战嚎 Battle Cry
Effect: Battle Cry.description: 生物在攻击和伤害检定上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold.name: 效果: 打破深渊 - 寒冷 Breach the Abyss - Cold

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire.name: 效果: 打破深渊 - 火焰 Breach the Abyss - Fire

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity.name: 效果: 打破深渊 - 电击 Breach the Abyss - Electricity

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative.name: 效果: 打破深渊 - 虚能 Breach the Abyss - Negative

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid.name: 效果: 打破深渊 - 酸蚀 Breach the Abyss - Acid

Effect: Distracting Frolic.name: 效果: 扰乱嬉闹 Distracting Frolic
Effect: Distracting Frolic.description: 目标盟友能够投掷2次豁免检定并取较好的结果。

Effect: Parry Dance.name: 效果: 招架舞步 Parry Dance
Effect: Parry Dance.description: 它的AC获得+2环境加值，直到它的下个回合结束。

Effect: Take Them Down!.name: 效果: 拿下他们！ Take Them Down!
Effect: Take Them Down!.description: 生物的攻击检定与伤害检定获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Aura of Command.name: 效果: 指挥灵光 Aura of Command
Effect: Aura of Command.description: 生物的攻击检定获得+1状态加值，意志检定获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Commander's Aura.name: 效果: 指挥灵光 Commander's Aura
Effect: Commander's Aura.description: 生物在攻击检定、伤害检定、AC、豁免和技能检定上获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Hurtful Critique.name: 效果: 损人恶评 Hurtful Critique
Effect: Hurtful Critique.description: 生物在攻击检定中承受-1环境减值（大失败为-2点）

Effect: Fiddle.name: 效果: 提琴奏鸣 Fiddle
Effect: Fiddle.description:
一段动听的小提琴曲调迫使生物跳起舞来。

失败 措手不及并受到10尺速度减值
大失败 如同失败，并缓慢1

Effect: Cite Precedent.name: 效果: 援引判例 Cite Precedent
Effect: Cite Precedent.description: 生物在下一轮法庭辩论中的交涉检定会遭受-2减值。

Effect: Hamstring.name: 效果: 断筋 Hamstring
Effect: Hamstring.description: 目标的速度承受-10尺状态减值。

Effect: Phalanx Fighter.name: 效果: 方阵步兵 Phalanx Fighter

Effect: Whirlwind Form.name: 效果: 旋风形态 Whirlwind Form
Effect: Whirlwind Form.description: 生物对物理伤害获得10点抗力。

Effect: Totems of the Past.name: 效果: 昔日图腾 Totems of the Past
Effect: Totems of the Past.description: 区域内的任何蜥蜴人盟友将受到启迪，攻击骰获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Crystalline Dust Form.name: 效果: 晶尘形态 Crystalline Dust Form

Effect: Shadow Rapier.name: 效果: 暗影细剑 Shadow Rapier
Effect: Shadow Rapier.description: 浪客用虚能包裹它的剑刃，将它的伤害类型变为虚能。

Effect: Necrotic Field.name: 效果: 暗蚀场 Necrotic Field
Effect: Necrotic Field.description: 在该灵光范围内的不死生物会在天生攻击中额外造成@Damage[1d6[void]]伤害。

Effect: Death Gasp.name: 效果: 死亡一息 Death Gasp
Effect: Death Gasp.description: 生物获得不死特征，并免疫流血、死亡效果、疾病、麻痹、毒素、睡眠。

Effect: Death Gasp (Etioling).name: 效果: 死亡一息 Death Gasp (衰变灵)
Effect: Death Gasp (Etioling).description: 衰变灵屏住呼吸时还额外获得虚体特征、25尺飞行速度、对全部伤害的10点抗力（除了力场、幽冥、命能；对抗非魔法伤害时抗力翻倍）。

Effect: Graveknight's Curse.name: 效果: 死墓骑士诅咒 Graveknight's Curse

Effect: Brutal Rally.name: 效果: 残忍激励 Brutal Rally
Effect: Brutal Rally.description: 生物的攻击检定获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Mutilating Bite.name: 效果: 毁灭之咬 Mutilating Bite
Effect: Mutilating Bite.description: 该生物在基于魅力的检定中受到-1状态减值。这个减值可以累积到-3。

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).name: 效果: 毁灭符文 Rune of Destruction (巨剑)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).description: 巨剑获得致命特征，重击时伤害增加3d12。并且被该武器命中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] 检定，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).name: 效果: 毁灭符文 Rune of Destruction (投石)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).description: 投石获得致命（deadly）特征，重击时伤害增加3d12。并且被该武器命中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] 检定，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).name: 效果: 毁灭符文 Rune of Destruction (长矛)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).description: 长矛获得致命（deadly）特征，重击时伤害增加3d8。并且被该武器命中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] 检定，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Effect: Spray Toxic Oil.name: 效果: 毒油喷射 Spray Toxic Oil
Effect: Spray Toxic Oil.description: 生物获得火焰弱点5，并且当生物以持握的武器进行攻击检定，得到大失败的结果时，武器掉落原地。

Effect: No Quarter!.name: 效果: 毫不留情！ No Quarter!
Effect: No Quarter!.description: 船长命令他的船员们毫不留情地战斗。船长20尺内所有等级不高于他的盟友在攻击检定和伤害检定上获得+1状态加值，直到船长的下一回合结束。

Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus.name: 效果: 水手长的命令 - 攻击加值 Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus
Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus.description: 生物在攻击检定上获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus.name: 效果: 水手长的命令 - 速度加值 Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus
Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus.description: 生物在速度上获得10尺状态加值。

Effect: Sandstorm.name: 效果: 沙尘暴 Sandstorm
Effect: Sandstorm.description: 生物的察觉检定受到-4环境减值。

Effect: Curse of Boiling Blood.name: 效果: 沸血诅咒 Curse of Boiling Blood
Effect: Curse of Boiling Blood.description: 生物获得火焰20的弱点并处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Effect: Blood Soak.name: 效果: 浸血 Blood Soak
Effect: Blood Soak.description: 生物的伤害检定获得+4状态加值。

Effect: Ganzi Resistance.name: 效果: 混沌裔抗性 Ganzi Resistance
Effect: Ganzi Resistance.description: 混沌裔获得酸蚀、电击或音波的1点抗性（每日随机选择）。

Effect: Call to Blood.name: 效果: 渴求鲜血 Call to Blood
Effect: Call to Blood.description: 生物在对抗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物时，攻击检定会获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Moon Frenzy.name: 效果: 满月狂乱 Moon Frenzy
Effect: Moon Frenzy.description: 化形生物体型增大1阶，触及增加5尺，啃咬伤害增加2点。

Effect: Waterlogged.name: 效果: 满溢 Waterlogged
Effect: Waterlogged.description: 当处于满溢状态，夸巴洛卡可以使用喷吐激流(Spray Water)动作，他们体型变为巨型(Gargantuan)并且速度下降到15尺。

Effect: Inspirational Presence.name: 效果: 激励学生 Inspirational Presence
Effect: Inspirational Presence.description: 教师灵光范围内的所有学生在进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}动作时获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Inspire Envoy.name: 效果: 激励特使 Inspire Envoy
Effect: Inspire Envoy.description: 龙会从攻击骰，AC，或下列全部：察觉，意志豁免，和所有基于魅力的技能检定上选择让其获得状态加值，具体数额取决于龙的种类。

Effect: Inspire Courage (Love Siktempora.name: 效果: 英勇颂歌 Inspire Courage (亲爱癔时妖)
Effect: Inspire Courage (Love Siktempora.description: 生物的攻击、伤害和对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Inspire Defense (Love Siktempora.name: 效果: 集结颂歌 Rallying Anthem (亲爱癔时妖)
Effect: Inspire Defense (Love Siktempora.description: 生物在AC和豁免上获得+2状态加值，对所有物理伤害获得4点抗力。

Effect: Invigorating Passion.name: 效果: 激情洋溢 Invigorating Passion
Effect: Invigorating Passion.description: 生物在10分钟内获得攻击骰上的+1状态加值和10点临时生命。

Effect: Activate Defenses.name: 效果: 激活防御 Activate Defenses

Effect: Curse of Fire.name: 效果: 火之诅咒 Curse of Fire

Effect: Volcanic Purge.name: 效果: 火山洗礼 Volcanic Purge
Effect: Volcanic Purge.description: 生物承受@Damage[4d6[persistent,fire]]伤害，而且只要该持续火焰伤害还存在，他们的速度还会承受-10状态减值。

Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).name: 效果: 火焰符文 Rune of Flames (巨剑)
Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).description: 巨剑的所有攻击造成额外3d6火焰伤害。

Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).name: 效果: 火焰符文 Rune of Flames (投石)
Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).description: 投石的所有攻击造成额外3d6火焰伤害。.

Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).name: 效果: 火焰符文 Rune of Flames (长矛)
Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).description: 长矛的所有攻击造成额外3d6火焰伤害。

Effect: Soul Siphon.name: 效果: 灵魂虹吸 Soul Siphon
Effect: Soul Siphon.description: 生物获得5临时生命值，并且攻击检定和伤害检定获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Aura of Misfortune.name: 效果: 灾祸灵光 Aura of Misfortune
Effect: Aura of Misfortune.description: 活着的生物在所有基于d20的检定中必须投掷两次，并且取较低的结果。

Effect: Alchemical Crossbow.name: 效果: 炼金弩 Alchemical Crossbow
Effect: Alchemical Crossbow.description: 炼金弩将额外造成该种炸弹可以造成的伤害类型1D6点。

Effect: Alchemical Strike.name: 效果: 炼金打击 Alchemical Strike
Effect: Alchemical Strike.description:
选择酸蚀，寒冷，电击或是火焰伤害，并允许炼金苦工将这种能量伤害灌输到拳击当中。

每一次打击都将造成和它们体内盛装的炸弹同类型的伤害1D6点。每个炸弹内有着可以施展10次这种打击的液体。

Effect: Pulse of Rage.name: 效果: 狂暴脉冲 Pulse of Rage

Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.name: 效果: 狂热激怒 Fanatical Frenzy
Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.description: 生物的攻击检定获得+1状态加值，伤害检定获得+2状态加值，AC获得-2状态减值。

Effect: Wolf Shape.name: 效果: 狼形态 Wolf Shape
Effect: Wolf Shape.description: 当犬魔变形为狼的时候，速度变为40尺并且啃咬获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}能力。

Effect: Hunted Fear.name: 效果: 猎杀恐惧 Hunted Fear
Effect: Hunted Fear.description: 生物在避免迷路的生存检定上承受-2环境减值。

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).name: 效果: 猛击符文 Rune of Smiting (巨剑)
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).description: 巨剑命中时，巨人能击退目标10尺（重击则击退20尺）。

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).name: 效果: 猛击符文 Rune of Smiting (投石)
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).description: 投石命中时，巨人能击退目标10尺（重击则击退20尺）。

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).name: 效果: 猛击符文 Rune of Smiting (长矛)
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).description: 长矛命中时，巨人能击退目标10尺（重击则击退20尺）。

Effect: Cat Sith's Mark.name: 效果: 猫妖精标记 Cat Sith's Mark
Effect: Cat Sith's Mark.description: 当被诅咒的生物在技能检定或是豁免骰获得大成功结果时，它将被转变为成功的结果。每一天，一个被诅咒的生物可以尝试一次@Check[type:flat|dc:10|traits:curse,misfortune|name:Break Cat Sith's Mark]来打破这个诅咒。

Effect: Revert Form.name: 效果: 现形 Revert Form
Effect: Revert Form.description: 生物的攻击检定、伤害检定、豁免检定和技能检定都获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Fed by Wood.name: 效果: 由木所生 Fed by Wood
Effect: Fed by Wood.description: 龙的颚咬附带的火焰伤害增加一个伤害骰。

Effect: Fed by Metal.name: 效果: 由金所生 Fed by Metal

Effect: Inspired Feast.name: 效果: 盛宴 Inspired Feast
Effect: Inspired Feast.description: 生物的攻击骰获得+1状态加值，伤害骰获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Crush Chitin.name: 效果: 碾碎甲壳 Crush Chitin

Effect: Filth Wave.name: 效果: 秽物之潮 Filth Wave

Effect: Call to Halt (Success).name: 效果: 站住！ Call to Halt (成功)
Effect: Call to Halt (Success).description: 目标在1分钟内的所有速度受到–10尺减值。

Effect: Runic Resistance.name: 效果: 符文抗力 Runic Resistance
Effect: Runic Resistance.description: 生物获得一种伤害类型的5点抗力。

Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.name: 效果: 粉碎地面 Splintered Ground (大失败)
Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.description: 生物所有速度都受到-15尺环境减值。

Effect: Splintered Ground.name: 效果: 粉碎地面 Splintered Ground
Effect: Splintered Ground.description: 生物所有速度都受到-10尺环境减值.

Effect: Sticky Spores.name: 效果: 粘性孢子 Sticky Spores
Effect: Sticky Spores.description: 生物的移动速度会受到-10状态减值。

Effect: Entangling Slime.name: 效果: 纠缠粘液 Entangling Slime
Effect: Entangling Slime.description: 生物获得笨拙1，移动速度获得5尺减值。

Effect: Form a Phalanx.name: 效果: 结阵 Form a Phalanx

Effect: Rope Snare.name: 效果: 绳套 Rope Snare

Effect: Gleaming Armor.name: 效果: 耀目宝甲 Gleaming Armor
Effect: Gleaming Armor.description: 龙在AC上获得+2状态修正以及取决于具体生物的抗力以对抗能量伤害。

Effect: Focused Assault.name: 效果: 聚焦突袭 Focused Assault
Effect: Focused Assault.description: 生物造成额外伤害，数额取决于它正持握的武器数量。

Effect: Dirty Bomb.name: 效果: 脏弹 Dirty Bomb
Effect: Dirty Bomb.description: 目标对抗同一个炼金师的脏弹而进行的额外强韧豁免时，获得-2的环境减值。

Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure).name: 效果: 脏弹 Dirty Bomb (大失败)
Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure).description: 目标对抗同一个炼金师的脏弹而进行的额外强韧豁免时，获得-3的环境减值。

Effect: Aura of Corruption.name: 效果: 腐化灵光 Aura of Corruption
Effect: Aura of Corruption.description: 对于那些相较其他生物，对植物生物能造成更多伤害或麻烦的效果来说，那些在豁免检定中失败的生物会被上述效果视为植物，但这些生物不会由于被视同为植物生物而获得任何好处。

Effect: Putrid Blast.name: 效果: 腐液爆发 Putrid Blast
Effect: Putrid Blast.description: 生物在1分钟内对地蜥人胆液进行的强韧豁免受到-2环境减值。

Effect: Caustic Mucus.name: 效果: 腐蚀粘液 Caustic Mucus
Effect: Caustic Mucus.description: 生物的速度承受-5尺状态减值。这种速度减值会随着持续酸蚀伤害的一同结束。

Effect: Adaptive Strike.name: 效果: 自适应打击 Adaptive Strike
Effect: Adaptive Strike.description: 生物特选择精金、寒铁或银；他的近战打击被视为该类型的材质。

Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical.name: 效果: 致幻花粉(大失败) Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical Failure)
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical.description: 生物对察觉检定和对心灵效果的豁免受到-4状态减值。

Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure).name: 效果: 致幻花粉(失败) Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure)
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure).description: 生物对察觉检定和对心灵效果的豁免受到-2状态减值。

Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.name: 效果: 苦乐交织的梦 Bittersweet Dreams
Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.description: 根据豁免成功等级不同，生物在攻击、豁免、技能检定上获得状态减值。

Effect: Sylvan Wine.name: 效果: 萨提尔珍酿 Sylvan Wine
Effect: Sylvan Wine.description: 生物在意志豁免上获得+1物品加值，在对抗恐惧的意志豁免上获得+3物品加值。

Effect: Void Shroud.name: 效果: 虚无寿衣 Void Shroud
Effect: Void Shroud.description: 活物会在对抗恐惧和死亡效果时，豁免检定承受-2状态减值。

Effect: Snake Form.name: 效果: 蛇形态 Snake Form
Effect: Snake Form.description: 水兽可以选择变化出一条更长的蛇尾，这让它的尾巴打击获得10尺触及和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{擒获 Grab}特征，但它的嘴咬失去持续流血伤害。

Effect: Blood Frenzy.name: 效果: 血之狂乱 Blood Frenzy
Effect: Blood Frenzy.description: 生物获得临时生命值和其他效果，取决于生物种类。

Effect: Blood Fury.name: 效果: 血怒 Blood Fury
Effect: Blood Fury.description: 生物的攻击骰获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Blood Wake.name: 效果: 血潮涌动 Blood Wake
Effect: Blood Wake.description: 生物在游泳的运动鉴定中获得-4状态减值。

Effect: Blood Magic.name: 效果: 血统奥秘 Blood Magic
Effect: Blood Magic.description: 生物在意志豁免上获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Bloodline Magic.name: 效果: 血脉法术 Bloodline Magic
Effect: Bloodline Magic.description: 生物在欺骗检定上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Guildmaster's Lead.name: 效果: 行会首领的领导 Guildmaster's Lead

Effect: Call to Action.name: 效果: 行动号召 Call to Action
Effect: Call to Action.description: 生物在攻击检定和伤害检定上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Regression.name: 效果: 衰退 Regression
Effect: Regression.description: 生物会缩小一个体型。此外，生物所有专家以上的熟练度将会减少为受训。

Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies).name: 效果: 调音灵光 - 敌人 Harmonizing Aura (Enemies)
Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies).description: 生物的音波伤害检定承受-2状态减值，AC和所有豁免在对抗音波和听觉效果时承受-1状态减值。

Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies).name: 效果: 调音灵光 - 盟友 Harmonizing Aura (Allies)
Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies).description: 生物在音波伤害获得+2状态加值，AC以及所有豁免在对抗音波和听觉效果时获得+1状态加值。。

Effect: Praise Adachros.name: 效果: 赞美位面残晶 Praise Adachros
Effect: Praise Adachros.description: 该生物的攻击骰、豁免骰、察觉和技能检定在1轮内有+1状态加值。

Effect: Choose Weakness.name: 效果: 选择弱点 Choose Weakness
Effect: Choose Weakness.description:
伽乐可以将他的能量抗性变为这些能量类型中的一种

他还可以将他的能量抗性变为这些能量类型中的一种（可以和打击所选的不同）。

Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.name: 效果: 邪毒诅咒 Curse of the Baneful Venom
Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.description: 生物立即尝试一次对毒素的豁免检定，并承受-2状态减值。

Effect: Defensive Assault.name: 效果: 防御攻击 Defensive Assault
Effect: Defensive Assault.description: 生物的AC获得环境加值，取决于该轮未使用武器数量。

Effect: Sting of the Lash.name: 效果: 鞭笞之刺 Sting of the Lash

Effect: Stick a Fork in It.name: 效果: 餐叉穿刺 Stick a Fork in It
Effect: Stick a Fork in It.description: 目标的速度受到-10尺环境减值。

Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).name: 效果: 鲜血虹吸(大失败) Blood Siphon (Critical Failure)
Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).description: 吸血魔雾的AC和豁免检定获得+2状态加值并获得迅捷状态。该迅捷获得的额外动作只能用来打击（Strike）。

Effect: Crocodile Form.name: 效果: 鳄鱼形态 Crocodile Form
Effect: Crocodile Form.description: 水兽可以选择变出短小的鳄鱼腿，地面移动速度增加为20尺，但它的嘴咬失去持续流血伤害。

Effect: Slime Trap.name: 效果: 黏液陷阱 Slime Trap
Effect: Slime Trap.description: 生物的速度受到-10尺环境减值。

Effect: Black Cat Curse.name: 效果: 黑猫诅咒 Black Cat Curse
Effect: Black Cat Curse.description: 效果 昏曦夫人对 30 尺内可见的一个生物发出令人憎恶的诅咒。如果目标未能通过@Check[type:will|dc:32]豁免，每当它试图进行攻击骰或豁免时，它必须掷骰两次并使用较低的结果。然后目标将在24小时内临时免疫。诅咒会一直存在，直到它被移除或目标在后续豁免中成功。受害者每小时可以尝试一次新的@Check[type:will|dc:32]豁免来结束诅咒。

Effect: Inspiring Presence.name: 效果: 鼓舞人心 Inspiring Presence
Effect: Inspiring Presence.description: 生物在对抗恐惧效果时的豁免检定有+2 环境加值。

Effect: Utter Despair.name: 效果: 语述绝望 Utter Despair
Effect: Utter Despair.description: 在语述绝望灵光内的活物会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。在区域内，他们无法正常地从这个惊惧状态中恢复，但只要一离开灵光区域就能立刻失去这个惊惧状态。

Effect: Despair.name: 效果: 绝望灵光 Despair
Effect: Despair.description: 灵光范围内活着的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。它无法从这种恐惧中自然恢复，但只要离开灵光范围就能立即恢复。

Effect: Spiritual Warden.name: 效果: 灵魂看护 Spiritual Warden
Effect: Spiritual Warden.description: 盟友对抗死亡效果，和以其灵魂为目标或控制其灵魂的效果时，在豁免骰上+2状态加值。

Effect: Bastion Aura.name: 效果: 要塞灵光 Bastion Aura
Effect: Bastion Aura.description: 灵光内的善良生物只要处于此范围内便拥有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速治疗 Fast Healing}30，并在攻击骰和伤害骰上获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Furious Possession.name: 效果: 狂怒附体 Furious Possession
Effect: Furious Possession.description:
被占据的生物获得12临时生命值，在解除占据时失去。在被占据时，此生物获得狂暴脉冲灵光。每当被附身的生物进行近战攻击时，嗔怒之魂可以用其虚幻之爪的攻击调整值、伤害值或它们两者来代替该生物自己打击的数值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.GC5441z8i7N8swk1]{效果: 狂暴脉冲}

Effect: Commanding Aura (Quara).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.Actor.JrowrtDilEG8dN2s]{库娅拉·奥申迪尔 Quara Orshendiel}

库娅拉周围的卓尔被她激励。灵光范围内的卓尔盟友在攻击骰和技能检定上有+1状态加值。
Effect: Commanding Aura (Quara).name: 效果: 指挥灵光 Commanding Aura (库娅拉)

Effect: Aura of Protection (Solar).description: 恒阳天使灵光范围内的盟友在对抗邪恶生物时在AC上+2状态加值，在对抗来自邪恶生物的效果时候在豁免上+2状态加值。该加值在对抗邪恶生物的控制效果，以及邪恶召唤生物的攻击时提升为+4 。
Effect: Aura of Protection (Solar).name: 效果: 守护灵光 Aura of Protection (恒阳天使)

Effect: Aura of Righteousness (Planetar).name: 效果: 正义灵光 Aura of Righteousness (地律天使)
Effect: Aura of Righteousness (Planetar).description: 灵光范围内的盟友在对抗邪恶生物时在AC上+2状态加值，在对抗邪恶生物时在伤害骰上+2状态加值。

Effect: Aura of Vitality.name: 效果: 生命灵光 Aura of Vitality
Effect: Aura of Vitality.description: 生命神使灵光范围内的盟友在所有豁免骰上获得+1状态加值，对命能和虚能伤害的抗力10，以及免受位面的具有命能和虚能特征的效果影响。灵光范围内12级及以下的动物无法攻击生命神使和神使的盟友，除非它们被控制或以其他方式强制攻击。

Effect: Under Command.name: 效果: 指挥下 Under Command

Effect: Unsettled Aura.name: 效果: 干扰力场 Unsettled Aura
Effect: Unsettled Aura.description: 高斯瑞格投射出不和谐的能量场，这能扰乱正在思维的生物的心智。任何位于距离高斯瑞格30尺内的非无心智生物都会在意志豁免中承受-1状态减值。

Effect: Wrath of Spurned Hospitality.name: 效果: 款待被拒绝的愤怒 Wrath of Spurned Hospitality
Effect: Wrath of Spurned Hospitality.description: 奈克精拳头打击的攻击和伤害检定会获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Draconic Breath Weapon Aura.name: 效果: 巨龙吐息灵光 Draconic Breath Weapon Aura
Effect: Draconic Breath Weapon Aura.description: 在龙使用吐息之后的1轮里，它的身体被灵光环绕。

Effect: Sacrifice Armor.name: 效果: 牺牲护甲 Sacrifice Armor
Effect: Sacrifice Armor.description: 孽生废品的AC在24小时之内降低2点。孽生废品的AC不能以此方式降低至16以下。.

Effect: Inspired Recitation.description: 60尺内的所有盟友在豁免骰上获得+1状态价值，并且获得10点临时生命值。
Effect: Inspired Recitation.name: 效果: 激励复诵 Inspired Recitation

Effect: Compelled Performance.name: 效果: 强令表演 Compelled Performance
Effect: Compelled Performance.description: 目标在表演检定上的+2状态加值，持续一周。

Effect: Aura of Growth.name: 效果: 滋长灵光 Aura of Growth
Effect: Aura of Growth.description: 其他植物生物位于此效果范围内时获得快速治疗20。

Effect: Wild Shape (Oaksteward).description: 橡树家宰的双手变为狂野利爪。
Effect: Wild Shape (Oaksteward).name: 效果: 荒野形态-橡树家宰 Wild Shape (Oaksteward)

Effect: Vengeful Fibers.name: 效果: 仇讨纤丝 Vengeful Fibers

Effect: Incendiary Dollop.name: 效果: 引火油层 Incendiary Dollop
Effect: Incendiary Dollop.description: 在接下来的1分钟内，或直到生物以一个单独的交互动作擦去油脂，否则生物从持续火焰伤害中恢复的DC增加2点。

Effect: Fold Form.description: 金折灵迅速展开并重新折叠自己的身体，从@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{动物形态 Animal Form}中选择一个新形态。这赋予她所选形态的移动速度和打击，但没有其他好处。它的攻击加值不变，伤害加值为+3。
Effect: Fold Form.name: 效果: 折叠形态 Fold Form

Effect: Howl of Vengeful Fury.description: 草人获得5点临时生命值，并在打击和豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。
Effect: Howl of Vengeful Fury.name: 效果: 复仇怒嚎 Howl of Vengeful Fury

Effect: Flammable.description: 燃烧期间，化猫的打击造成额外1d6火焰伤害。
Effect: Flammable.name: 效果: 易燃 Flammable

Effect: Impersonated Ability.description: 无面鬼模仿者获得可模仿能力之一。
Effect: Impersonated Ability.name: 效果: 模仿能力 Impersonated Ability

Effect: Soul Lock (Healing).name: 效果: 魂锁 Soul Lock (治疗)
Effect: Soul Lock (Healing).description: 该魔族获得快速治疗5，持续1分钟。
